name: Treasury specialist
description:
Responsibilities

  • Accumulation and analysis of data needed for further Company’s financial reporting preparation
  • Preparation of financial reporting and statistics observations of Company’s activity
  • Financial market research of related goods, works and services
  • Consulting regarding all kinds of financial issues
  • To plan and control cashflow of Company.
  • To take part in monthly/yearly Company’s cashflow planning activity.
  • To keep contact with banks regarding operations connected with credit lines and deposits.
  • To hold quarter based internal audit of financial and accounting activity of Company.
  • To perform on-time update of Company`s policies and procedures manual (GPPM).
  • To provide necessary data regarding financial activity of Company upon other departments’ employees requests and fulfill tasks from management

Requirements:

  • macro- and microeconomics
  • financial reporting and its analysis
  • basics of SAP
  • English language
  • MS Excel
  • Basics of Labour legislation, Norms and Regulation of Labor Safety

Conditions:

  • lunch compensation

  • mobile allowance

  • medical insurance
